org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Class UnboundReactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.UnboundReactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, MessageSource, Reactor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IsolationReactor, NonBlockingReactor

    public abstract class UnboundReactor
extends ReactorBase
    Common code for NonBlockingReactor and IsolationReactor, which are not bound to a thread.

    UnboundReactor supports thread migration only between instances of this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnboundReactor

        public UnboundReactor(Facility _facility,
              int _initialOutboxSize,
              int _initialLocalQueueSize,
              java.lang.Runnable _onIdle)
        Create an unbound targetReactor.
        Parameters:
        _facility - The facility of this targetReactor.
        _initialOutboxSize - Initial size of the outbox for each unique message destination.
        _initialLocalQueueSize - The initial number of slots in the doLocal queue.
        _onIdle - Object to be run when the inbox is emptied, or null.

              throws java.lang.Exception
        Flushes buffered messages, if any. Returns true if there was any.
        Parameters:
